variables
Class vars

java.lang.Object
  variables.vars

public class vars
extends java.lang.Object

Please configure those variables to generate test and train arf model and to make inline experiments

Field Summary
 boolean amountofingreds
           
 int featureapparitionsminimum
          feature selection
 java.lang.String lexicalfutures
          Ingredients features file path : see paper

          ARFF output files path
 int modelType
          variable set to define model to generate
model = 1 type of recipe / 2 difficulty of recipe
!
static java.lang.String myPath
          please define a deft13 folder with all the files in your home folder and then point on it trough this complete uri
 int ngramsSize
          ngrams size
 int parmsreduce
          Reduction de parametres - quantite (top) ou -1 tout ce qui est dans le fichier
 java.lang.String pathToCorpus
          train and dev corpus (cross validation made trough Weka) Please consider that those corpus are copyrighted, to regenerate the ARFF Files from them, you need a license on the evaluation corpus from DEFT organization we obtained those XML under linux by cat *.xml > Tx.xml
 java.lang.String pathToNgramsFeatures
          ngrams feature file : see paper
 java.lang.String pathtoweightedverbfeats

Constructor Summary
vars()
          this is activated as constructor and will eventually fix vars on model 2 according to modeltype (else default values are set)

Field Detail

myPath

public static java.lang.String myPath
please define a deft13 folder with all the files in your home folder and then point on it trough this complete uri

modelOutputPath

public java.lang.String modelOutputPath
ARFF output files path

pathToCorpus

public java.lang.String pathToCorpus
train and dev corpus (cross validation made trough Weka) Please consider that those corpus are copyrighted, to regenerate the ARFF Files from them, you need a license on the evaluation corpus from DEFT organization we obtained those XML under linux by cat *.xml > Tx.xml

xmlT1

public java.lang.String xmlT1
Test corpus input path. Those corpus are copyrighted, we can't provide them. To regenerate the ARFF Files from them, you need a license on the evaluation corpus from DEFT organization we obtained those XML under linux by cat *.xml > Tx.xml

xmlT2

public java.lang.String xmlT2
Corpus for task 2

modelType

public int modelType
variable set to define model to generate
model = 1 type of recipe / 2 difficulty of recipe
! Caution ! Those numbers are not compliant with the task numbers (inverted 1=2 and 2 =1 sorry)

featureapparitionsminimum

public int featureapparitionsminimum
feature selection

vars

public vars()
